PIN.values: |Velocity Wrap Divisor|,|Velocity Wrap Divisor|,|Velocity Wrap Divisor|

|&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;- press CTRL to accelerate&cr;&lf;- and ALT to brake;&cr;&lf;- use LEFT and RIGHT to steer.&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;try to drive as fast as possible without crashing. your score is increased for every road post you pass. you've got 10 seconds before the score is reset to 0. try to reach 130 points to extend time.&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;see upper left corner for your score,&cr;&lf;upper right corner for time left and&cr;&lf;center for highscore&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;|
